name: uprising
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an act of opposition, sometimes using violence, by many people in one area of a country against those who are in power: Following a determined resistance in the east, there was eventually a popular uprising in the capital. Synonyms
insurrection
rebellion
revolt Compare
revolution (POLITICS)
